homepage.hero.title.message: A modern language for a new wave of development

homepage.hero.subtitle.message: Intuitive syntax, powerful performance, and built-in safety. Wave is designed to boost your productivity and make your application robust.

homepage.features.one.description.message: Wave reduces unnecessary code and allows you to focus on core logic. It is easy to learn and enjoyable to use with modern syntax.

homepage.features.two.description.message: Compiles to native code, achieving C++ level performance through zero-cost abstractions. Ideal for resource-intensive tasks.

homepage.features.three.description.message: Prevents common bugs like null reference errors at compile time. Built-in concurrency model makes multicore programming easier than ever.

homepage.translations.subtitle.message: 전 세계 개발자들이 언어 장벽 없이 Wave를 배울 수 있도록 번역에 기여해주세요.
